name: Honey Infused Hydrating Hair Mask
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Masks
about: What it is: A deeply conditioning hair mask enriched with Gisou Mirsalehi Honey that delivers hydration, softness, and shine to dry, brittle hair in 5 minutes...Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Concerns:.- Damage/Split Ends/Breakage.- Dryness.- Frizz..Key Benefits:.- Deeply nourishes and hydrates hair.- Strengthens hair to prevent future breakage.- Tames frizz, restores elasticity, shine, and manageability..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Mirsalehi Honey: A natural humectant that attracts and retains moisture for stronger, healthier, shinier hair..- Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein: Conditions, Softens, and smooths..- Provitamin B: Strengthens, moisturizes, and repairs damage...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Gisou’s nourishing, oil-rich formula weightlessly conditions for soft, hydrated hair in 5 minutes.  Packed with Mirsalehi Honey, hydrolyzed wheat protein, and provitamin B, the mask quenches dryness, smooths, & strenghthens for shiny, healthy-looking hair...Fragrance Description: Delicate, sweet notes of honey blend into spring florals inspired by our Gisou Mirsalehi Bee Garden, while citrusy notes of apricot and mandarin bring a playful twist to its aroma....
ingredients: -Mirsalehi Honey: A natural humectant that attracts and retains moisture for stronger, healthier, shinier hair..-Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein: Conditions, Softens, and smooths..-Provitamin B: Strengthens, moisturizes, and repairs damage...Aqua (Water), Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Cetyl Esters, Glycerin, Helianthus Annuus Hybrid (Sunflower Seed) Oil, Hydrogenated Castor Oil/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Mirsalehi Honey, Quaternium-87, Isopropyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Candelilla Cera (Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax), Caprylyl Glycol, Panthenol, Parfum (Fragrance)*, Sodium Benzoate, Propylene Glycol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Passiflora Incarnata Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Gardenia Taitensis Flower Extract, Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Ci 19140 (Yellow 5), Ci 14700 (Red 4), Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool..The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply a generous amount to damp or dry hair from mid-lengths to ends..-Leave on for five to seven minutes, then rinse thoroughly with cool water..-For an extra-hydrating treatment, combine with two to three drops of Gisou Honey Infused Hair Oil (sold separately). Repeat steps above..-Start with less for fine or short hair, focusing on mid-length to ends.

reviews.review_text: I have been wanting this product for a while now, and let me tell you, wow!  One thing is that the directions say to have your hair 50% dry before applying the product. I normally squeeze out the water and then apply for most hair masks.   But for this, I gently dried my hair with a microfiber towel and applied the product. It was almost challenging to  distribute evenly because of how thick it is. And with dry hair that was even harder so I put some conditioner at the tips to spread it better and then left it in for 7 minutes.  After that, I took it out, and my hair was crazy soft!! It doesn't smell like much, which is nice when u are using a bunch of products. totally reccomend!

reviews.review_title: Great results for my fine hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually don't like masks for my fine hair (they can be too much), but the Gisou honey mask did wonders for my hair. It left it smooth and conditioned, without weighting it down. I didn't notice any extra shine. Like all hair product it won't repair damaged hair, but it makes my split dry end look a little better until I manage to get my next hair cut. I was surprised I could use it every wash (3-4 days) without being to much. Usually I dislike scented hair care products, but the honey notes make Gisou products tolerable. The consistency is very thick, almost like a wax, so sometimes it's very difficult to apply; and also I need to apply a lot each use.

reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for the Gisou hair mask, but after trying it once, I didn’t notice any real difference in my hair. The texture is extremely thick, which means you have to use a lot of product to cover your hair, especially if it’s long. Given how much I needed to apply, the 7.8 oz jar would only last about 5-6 uses at most. For the price, that just didn’t feel worth it to me, so I ended up returning it.

reviews.review_title: A Solid Choice with Room for Improvement
reviews.review_text: While it didn't deliver that wow factor I was hoping for, it's definitely worth a closer look.  First off, let's talk results. This mask does a commendable job of smoothing out those lovely locks of ours. Granted, it doesn't possess an extraordinary ability beyond what you'd find in your average drugstore mask. However, I love that is Clear at Sephora.  One thing that immediately caught my attention was the packaging. Sleek, stylish, and evoking a sense of luxury, it's hard not to appreciate the effort put into the design.  What truly won me over was the availability of a mini size. It's a smart move on their part, allowing customers to try it out without committing to a full-sized product blindly. Major points for convenience and accessibility!  All in all, while the Gisou mask didn't blow me away, it remains a solid choice that deserves consideration. If you enjoy experimenting with different hair care products and appreciate thoughtfully crafted packaging, I'd definitely recommend giving it a shot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This hair mask is everything. It’s so hydrating and I feel like it helps my curls and calms down the frizz. I have pretty thick hair and noticed I don’t need as much product as other masks. It smells great too - I’ll be repurchasing this for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing!! It’s lightweight and a little goes a long way. It’s hydrating and leaves my hair feeling so smooth. It doesn’t make your hair greasy after which I initially was worried about. Highly recommend

This was gifted by Gisou. I have dandruff itchy scalp during winters and finally found a mask that makes my hair shiny plus removes the itchy skin. It is smooth, easy to use, I love how it leaves a light scent as well. Personal favorite. You do get a little less for the price but it’s worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This Honey Infused Hair Mask From Gisou is perfect for my dry, thin hair. It added so much moisture and shin to my hair on the first use that I am absolutely going to keep using it! I can't wait to see long term effects!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This hair mask is just amazing!!! It feels so luxurious and instantly hydrating and really helps heal my damaged ends. Even after first use I’ve noticed a difference. Plus that smell is to die for!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite Gisou product! I have bleached blonde hair which always needs hydration and this mask works wonders on my hair.  I apply it either after I shampoo my hair for 10-20 mins or before going to hot yoga class and leave it on for an hour. My hair has never looked shinier and smoother than after using this mask! Feels like I went to the salon to get a professional hair treatment. And the smell is just WOW. Definitely going to purchase a full size jar!

reviews.review_title: Wasn’t life-changing but I still like it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask came in quality packaging, some may consider it excessive packaging but I think for its retail price, a little extra to make sure it’s not damaged is expected. It works well, made my hair soft in the shower, has a texture similar to most masks (thick, slightly sticky, creamy). The smell is not my favorite, I’ve had stronger & more youthful smelling masks that I enjoy more, however I do associate lighter smelling products to be a bit higher end and seem less synthetic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! Their hair products are some of my favorites. I use like 4 of their products. This stuff has made such a difference in my hair. I have used so many hair masks but this one has truly made a difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this on dry hair after washing my hair and I expected my hair to feel oily the next day and it was the complete opposite. My hair looked amazing! Hydrated and smelling so good without it weighing my hair down

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so intrigued by this brand and had to try the mask! It’s thick and definitely very moisturizing! It left my hair feeling soft and looking shiny without making my roots oilier than usual. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A wishlisted product that I finally got to try out and boy am I impressed!   Hair masks are my favourite way of giving my hair that extra bit of love and care so I'm always on the look out for new ones to try. This mask is fantastic! After using, it makes my hair feel so healthy and light without being frizzy. I can actually see how much shiner and smoother my hair looks. It comes packaged so prettily and as someone how loves fragranced haircare, this ticks all the boxes for me.   I'll certainly be getting a full sized tub!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hair is really dry and this really affects my scalp too, but ever since I started using this hair mask I feel like my hair is so much more moisturized. However, it is a little pricey and I do not know if I would buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this honey infused hair mask from Gisou. It smells absolutely great. My hair is smooth, silky, soft and healthy. I am absolutely loving this one. My hair is no longer frizzy or dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great hair mask if you are struggling with dry hair. I’ve used this month, and it’s already made a huge difference in my hair. It helps get rid of the phrase, and it smells amazing. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this travel size of this Gisou Honey Infused Hair Mask since I usually don’t travel with a hair mask due to the large containers. This has been making my hair look healthy and shiny. Such a great haircare brand!

reviews.review_title: Great for Dry and Damaged Hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! It smells incredible and hydrates my hair whenever I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a thick, creamy, beautiful product. It leaves my hair SO soft and shiny! I have fine, curly hair and it does not weigh my curls down. I use this product once a week for a deep conditioning moment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would not recommend this product if you have fine hair. It made my hair tangled and dry. I went back to using the Ouai fine hair mask pretty quickly.
